metadata.feature_description: Search and retrieve site pages for URL management operations

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Retrieve all pages without search filter

steps.action: Navigated to SEO > URL Management > TEST URL tab
steps.expected: TEST URL page loads with Page to Test dropdown
steps.actual: TEST URL page loaded with Page to Test dropdown visible

steps.action: Clicked on Page to Test dropdown to open page picker
steps.expected: Dropdown opens showing all available site pages
steps.actual: Dropdown opened displaying 16 site pages including Home, Our Products, Activity Feed, Community, Search Results, 404 Error Page, Admin, Wiki Test, Groups, Test Page One, News, Test Normal Page, Publish Test Page, and more

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Search pages by title with partial text match

steps.action: Typed 'Test' in the search pages searchbox
steps.expected: Page list filters to show only pages containing 'Test' in their name
steps.actual: Page list filtered from 16 results to 8 results, showing: Wiki Test, Test Page One, Test Normal Page, Publish Test Page, long page name with test, URL Type Test Page, News SubPage Test, Test Page Two

steps.action: Observed search results for 'Test' search term
steps.expected: Search should find pages regardless of case (e.g., 'Wiki Test' should be found when searching 'Test')
steps.actual: Search found 'Wiki Test' when searching for 'Test', confirming case-insensitive search works correctly

steps.action: Clicked on 'Test Page One' from the filtered search results
steps.expected: Page should be selected and displayed in the Page to Test field
steps.actual: Page was successfully selected. 'Test Page One' now displays in the Page to Test field and the 'Test URL' button is now enabled

observations: The GetSitePages API (UrlManagementServiceController.cs:515-523) uses GetFilteredSitePages method which filters tabs by LocalizedTabName using case-insensitive IndexOf comparison
The page picker component displays pages in a hierarchical tree structure with expandable nodes for pages with children
Pages with DisableLink=true are excluded from the results as per the code at line 159
